author: SpunkyAmbassador

defaultParameters.description: Minimum time interval between typing letters in miliseconds
defaultParameters.name: minTime

defaultParameters.description: Maximum time interval between typing letters in miliseconds
defaultParameters.name: maxTime

commands.description: Shows text in typewriting effect. Printing letter by letter.
commands.name: Show Text

description:
Prints messages letter by letter, giving it a typewriter effect.

---

Tutorial -
To add typewriting text, just use "Show Text" command and tweak the parameters to your liking.

To remove text box, use "Remove A Picture" command. The ID of picture has to be same as ID of the box.

---

Credits to @Russo (russodafederal) for "Multiple Window Boxes" plugin as majority of code is reused from that plugin.
name: Typewriter Text
